label: Paxton, Hannelore & Andrés Arias.  2017. Unveiling a surprising diversity of the genus Diopatra Audouin & Milne Edwards, 1833 (Annelida: Onuphidae) in the Macaronesian region  (eastern North Atlantic) with the description of four new species. Zootaxa 4300(4): 505–535.
